metadata.title: 1999 Izmit Earthquake
metadata.reference: Barka, A., H. S. Akyz, E. Altunel, G. Sunal, Z. Akir, A. Dikbas, B. Yerli, R. Armijo, B. Meyer, J. B. d. Chabalier, T. Rockwell, J. R. Dolan, R. Hartleb, T. Dawson, S. Christofferson, A. Tucker, T. Fumal, R. Langridge, H. Stenner, W. Lettis, J. Bachhuber, and W. Page (2002). The Surface Rupture and Slip Distribution of the 17 August 1999 Izmit Earthquake (M 7.4), North Anatolian Fault, Bull. Seism. Soc. Am. 92, 43-60.
